mapper.select: SELECT ttp.travel_together_post_id as postId, ttp.*, ttp.recruited_number AS recruitedNumber, ttp.total_number AS totalNum, tu.tb_user_id as userId, tu.email, tu.name AS userName, c.country, c.city, CASE WHEN ttp.end_date >= CURRENT_DATE THEN DATE_PART('day', AGE(ttp.end_date, CURRENT_DATE))::integer -- 모집 마감까지 남은 날짜 계산 ELSE 0 -- end_date가 현재 날짜보다 이전인 경우 0 END AS remainingDays FROM travel_together_post ttp LEFT JOIN tb_user tu ON ttp.tb_user_id = tu.tb_user_id LEFT JOIN country c ON ttp.country_id = c.country_id WHERE ttp.travel_together_post_id = #{postId};

SELECT ttp.travel_together_post_id as postId, ttp.*, tu.email FROM travel_together_post ttp LEFT JOIN tb_user tu ON ttp.tb_user_id = tu.tb_user_id where ttp.enabled = #{enabled} ORDER BY ttp.deadline ASC

SELECT ttp.travel_together_post_id as postId, ttp.*, tu.email FROM travel_together_post ttp LEFT JOIN tb_user tu ON ttp.tb_user_id = tu.tb_user_id WHERE ttp.enabled = #{enabled} -- 나라를 입력받았다면 AND ttp.country_id = #{searchDto.countryId}
-- 시작 날짜를 입력받았다면 AND end_date >= #{searchDto.startDate} -- 내 출발 날짜는 여행 마감 날짜보다 이전이어야 함
-- 마지막 날짜를 입력받았다면 AND start_date <= #{searchDto.endDate} -- 내 마감 날짜는 여행 출발 날짜보다 이후여야 함
ORDER BY ttp.deadline DESC
mapper.insert: insert into travel_together_post (title, content, country_id, tb_user_id, start_date, end_date, deadline, total_number, create_date, enabled) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{countryId}, #{userId}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{deadline}, #{totalNum}, #{createDate}, true)
mapper.update: UPDATE travel_together_post SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, country_id = #{countryId}, total_number = #{totalNum}, deadline = #{deadline} where travel_together_post_id = #{postId}
UPDATE travel_together_post SET enabled = false WHERE deadline < #{now} AND enabled = true
mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM recruited_member WHERE travel_together_post_id = #{postId} AND tb_user_id = #{userId} ) THEN true ELSE false END AS supported
